detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in fine-knit linen with buttons down the front.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Dressing gown in soft, patterned fleece with a hood, side pockets and tie belt at the waist.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Suede belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Tube top in ribbed cotton jersey.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist and intarsia motif.

Sandals in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with covered wedge heels. Open toes and a foot strap at the front, an ankle-height shaft with an open section at the back and a wide ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm. Heel 8 cm.
Glittery Alice band with ears on the top.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, notch lapels and buttons at the front. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and wide legs.
Fully lined, shimmering metallic bikini bottoms with a mid waist.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with print stripes and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Blouse in a woven cotton blend with pleated details. Pleated stand-up collar that continues down the button band, partly concealed buttons at the top and a seam at the waist. Wide smocking and a pleated flounce at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and shoulder pads.
5-pocket jeans in denim with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Coat in a felted wool blend with narrow notch lapels, concealed buttons at the front, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
PREMIUM QUALITY. Hat in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend.
V-neck top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wide lace trim around the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck top in soft, ribbed jersey.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot, decorative bow at the front, grosgrain trim around the top edge and a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, button placket and long sleeves.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, button placket, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Polo-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Visible seam front and back, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Treggings in superstretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and short dolman sleeves. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, stretch fabric with lined cups and a wrapover front for easier nursing access. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Short, tiered skirt in a crinkled weave with smocking at the waist and a hole-embroidered hem. Lined.
Leggings in extra sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.

Fully lined bikini. Triangle top with a decorative bow at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that fasten at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bottoms with bows at the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Sun hat in an airy cotton weave with a small embroidered detail on one side and ties under the chin. Lined.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and slits in the sides of the hem.
Fine-knit jumper in a relaxed fit with a draped polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams, a detachable lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and chin guard at the front. Chest pocket with a flap and press-stud, front pockets with a waterproof zip, an adjustable elasticated waist and elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reinforced legs and back, reinforced elastic strap under the feet and reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Wide sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and straight legs.
Puff pants in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative bow at the front and elasticated, frill-trimmed hems.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded cups with removable inserts, double adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless. Light support.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section at the front, a mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem with embossed text. Medium support.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Flat, round earrings in various designs. Diameter 1.3 cm.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck with a lace trim at the top and adjustable spaghetti straps.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Short dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Fitted top in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Straight-cut double-breasted jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.

V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces around the neckline that continue down the front. Yoke at the back with gathers to provide extra width, and long sleeves with a pleat and buttons at the cuffs.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a small zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in a soft, organic cotton textured weave with a frill trim at the front, elastication at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Treggings in soft stretch twill with a brushed finish. Zip fly and button and back pockets.
Glasses with plastic and metal frames and clear lenses.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lined wrapover bikini top with long ties, lined triangular cups with removable inserts, and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Wide, V-neck jumper in waffle-knit cotton with hard-worn details, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and twisted side seams.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared legs with embroidery and cut-off hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled fabric with a flounce around the neckline and down the front. V-shaped opening with narrow ties at the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves with a drawstring and frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist for added width. Sewn-in, V-neck underdress in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy cotton twill with a collar, metal buttons down the front, a yoke and short sleeves. Flap chest pockets with a button, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Elasticated fabric waist belt with a shell-shaped metal buckle and hook-and-eye fastener. Width approx. 5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Fitted, turtleneck top in stretch, imitation leather with a zip at the back and long sleeves.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Wide shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, ties at the front and patch front pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long raglan sleeves and a rounded, flounced hem. Longer at the back.
Braided plastic waist belt with a covered metal buckle. Width 4.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Short cardigan knitted in fluffy yarn with long sleeves and no buttons.

Sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, embroidered appliqués at the top and a concealed zip at the back. Gathered seam and a wide lace trim at the waist and a flared skirt with a rounded hem and embroidered appliqués. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with a V-neck front and back. Sewn-in wrapover and concealed press-stud at the front, double flounce around the neckline, ties across the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Set with a sleeveless dress and puff pants in a jacquard knit. Dress with a frill at the top and press-studs at the back. Unlined. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.
Dress in an airy crêpe weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck and wrapover opening, ties at the waist and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
